EC. DIF. HOMOGÃ‰NEAS - Ejercicio 5

Ecuaciones Diferenciales\n[imath]\begin{array}{c}\n\left(1+2 e^{x / y}\right) d x \ldots \\\n\ldots+2 e^{x / y}\left(1-\frac{x}{y}\right) d y=0\n\end{array}[/imath][imath]\left(1+2 e^{x / y}\right) d x \ldots [/imath] [imath]\ldots+2 e^{x / y}\left(1-\frac{x}{y}\right) d y=0[/imath]
